languages.text: "После посещения нижних палуб мое тело покрыла странная сыпь. Можешь помочь мне?"
languages.translation_comment: Если на игроке висит дебафф LT_Contaminated_buff
Если на игроке висит дебафф LT_Contaminated_buff

languages.text: "A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"
languages.original_text: "После посещения нижних палуб мое тело покрыла странная сыпь. Можешь помочь мне?"

traits.locale_text: "A strange rash broke out all over my body after I'd been to the lower decks. Can you help me?"
"A strange rash broke out all over my body after I'd been to the lower decks. Can you help me?"
"A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"
"A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"
"A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"
"A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"

languages.text: «Después de mi visita a las cubiertas inferiores, me ha aparecido un sarpullido extraño por todo el cuerpo. ¿Puede ayudarme?».
languages.original_text: "A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"

traits.locale_text: «Después de mi visita a las cubiertas inferiores, me ha aparecido un sarpullido extraño por todo el cuerpo. ¿Puede ayudarme?».

languages.text: 「下のデッキに行った後、全身に奇妙な発疹ができました。助けてくれますか？」
languages.original_text: "A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"

traits.locale_text: 「下のデッキに行った後、全身に奇妙な発疹ができました。助けてくれますか？」

languages.text: “我到了底层甲板之后，身上就起了某种古怪的疹子。你能帮我吗？”
languages.original_text: "A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"

traits.locale_text: “我到了底层甲板之后，身上就起了某种古怪的疹子。你能帮我吗？”

languages.text: "Ich habe nach meinem Besuch auf den unteren Decks am ganzen Körper einen merkwürdigen Ausschlag bekommen. Könnt Ihr mir helfen?"
languages.original_text: "A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nach meinem Besuch auf den unteren Decks am ganzen Körper einen merkwürdigen Ausschlag bekommen. Könnt Ihr mir helfen?"

languages.text: « Une étrange éruption cutanée s'est propagée à l'ensemble de mon corps après ma visite des ponts inférieurs. Vous pouvez m'aider ? »
languages.original_text: "A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"

traits.locale_text: « Une étrange éruption cutanée s'est propagée à l'ensemble de mon corps après ma visite des ponts inférieurs. Vous pouvez m'aider ? »

languages.text: "Alt güverteleri ziyaretim sırasında tüm bedenimde tuhaf bir kızarıklık meydana geldi. Bana yardım edebilir misin?"
languages.original_text: "A strange rash broke out all over my body after my visit to the lower decks. Can you help me?"
